attributes.action: Call for MPs to petition the new Prime Minister to lay out BrExit roadmap
attributes.additional_details: The EU Referendum was a victory for the Leave camp and therefore all candidates, in the running for the position of Prime Minister, should make public their intention, or not, of moving the UK towards an independent sovereign state outside of the EU as per the referendum results.
attributes.background: With a new Prime Minister on the horizon this petition is to call on Members of Parliament to urge all candidates to lay out their plans for a BrExit as part of their leadership challenge

rejection.details: The relevant date for this petition has passed.
